ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the employer phone number field is properly validated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR(ISCHANGED( FinServ__EmployerPhoneNumber__c ) && NOT(ISNULL( FinServ__EmployerPhoneNumber__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK( FinServ__EmployerPhoneNumber__c )) && !REGEX( FinServ__EmployerPhoneNumber__c ,'^\\d{10,25}$'), ISNEW() && NOT(ISNULL( FinServ__EmployerPhoneNumber__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK( FinServ__EmployerPhoneNumber__c )) && !REGEX( FinServ__EmployerPhoneNumber__c ,'^\\d{10,25}$')),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid format entered for employer phone number. The minimum number of digits should be 10
